legend: Fifth conference participants, 1927. Institut International de Physique Solvay in Leopold Park..
title: Solvay Conference on Physics, from 24 to 29 October 1927

guest.name: Marie Curie
guest.bio: A Polish and naturalized-French physicist and chemist who conducted pioneering research on radioactivity, the first woman to win a Nobel Prize, the first person and only woman to win twice.
